pr_title: [FLINK-19982][test] Change the log when CollectSinkFunction receives an invalid request from debug to info for future investigation

timeline.message: [FLINK-19982][test] Change the log when CollectSinkFunction receives an invalid request from debug to info for future investigation

timeline.bodyText: How many these logs will there be? Will it flow the log file?
timeline.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText:
It won't flow the log file. This log only happens when the sink (that is to say, the task containing the sink) starts or restarts.
This is a mechanism to inform the collect iterator that the sink has restarted and is an expected behavior. So an info log is enough.
replies.author: tsreaper
